name: Psychology & Mental Health
description: Important terms for understanding psychology, mental health, and human behavior concepts.
context: psychology, mental health, and behavioral science

words.meaning: relating to mental processes of perception, memory, and reasoning
treatment intended to relieve or heal a disorder
a feeling of worry, nervousness, or unease
a mental condition characterized by persistent sadness
the ability to recover quickly from difficulties
the practice of purposeful awareness of the present moment
the ability to understand and share feelings of others
the study and treatment of mental illness
combination of characteristics forming individual character
the reason for acting or behaving in a particular way
the way in which one acts or conducts oneself
the state of being awake and aware of surroundings
existing in the mind but not immediately available to consciousness
the way in which something is regarded or interpreted
